name: intel-oneapi-vpl
description:
The Intel oneAPI Video Processing Library (oneVPL) is the successor to
Intel Media SDK. This library takes you from abstractions for integrated
graphics to using oneVPL to unlock media features on a much broader
range of accelerators. oneVPL provides a single, video-focused API for
encoding, decoding, and video processing that works across a wide range
of accelerators. The library is perfect for applications spanning
broadcasting, streaming, video on demand (VOD), in-cloud gaming, and
remote desktop solutions. LICENSE INFORMATION: By downloading and using
this software, you agree to the terms and conditions of the software
license agreements at https://intel.ly/393CijO.
